verses.verse: Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Go <S%H935><s%> in to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> for I have hardened <S%H3513><s%> his heart, <S%H3820><s%> and the heart <S%H3820><s%> of his servants, <S%H5650><s%> that I may show <S%H7896><s%> these my signs <S%H226><s%> in their midst, <S%H7130><s%>

and that you may tell <S%H5608><s%> in the hearing <S%H241><s%> of your son, <S%H1121><s%> and of your son <S%H1121><s%>'s son, <S%H1121><s%> what things I have done <S%H5953><s%> to Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and my signs <S%H226><s%> which I have done <S%H7760><s%> among them; <S%H3045><s%> that you may know that I am Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> went in <S%H935><s%> to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H3068><s%> "This is what Yahweh, the God <S%H430><s%> of the Hebrews, <S%H5680><s%> says: <S%H559><s%> <S%H4970><s%> 'How long will you refuse <S%H3985><s%> to humble <S%H6031><s%> yourself before <S%H6440><s%> me? <S%H5971><s%> Let my people go, <S%H7971><s%> that they may serve me. <S%H5647><s%>

Or else, <S%H3588><s%> if you refuse <S%H3986><s%> to let my people <S%H5971><s%> go, <S%H7971><s%> behold, <S%H4279><s%> tomorrow I will bring <S%H935><s%> locusts <S%H697><s%> into your country, <S%H1366><s%>

and they shall cover <S%H3680><s%> the surface <S%H5869><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> so that one won't <S%H3201><s%> be able to see <S%H7200><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%> They shall eat <S%H398><s%> the residue <S%H3499><s%> of that which has escaped, <S%H6413><s%> which remains <S%H7604><s%> to you from the hail, <S%H1259><s%> and shall eat <S%H398><s%> every tree <S%H6086><s%> which grows <S%H6779><s%> for you out of the field. <S%H7704><s%>

Your houses <S%H1004><s%> shall be filled, <S%H1004><s%> and the houses of all your servants, <S%H5650><s%> and the houses <S%H1004><s%> of all the Egyptians; <S%H4714><s%> as neither your fathers <S%H1><s%> nor your fathers <S%H1><s%>' fathers <S%H1><s%> have seen, <S%H7200><s%> since the day <S%H3117><s%> that they were on the earth <S%H127><s%> to this day. <S%H3117><s%>'" He turned, <S%H6437><s%> and went out <S%H3318><s%> from Pharaoh. <S%H6547><s%>

Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s servants <S%H5650><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H4170><s%> "How long will this man be a snare to us? <S%H582><s%> Let the men go, <S%H7971><s%> that they may serve <S%H5647><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> their God. <S%H430><s%> Don't <S%H2962><s%> you yet know <S%H3045><s%> that Egypt <S%H4714><s%> is destroyed? <S%H6><s%>"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> were brought again <S%H7725><s%> to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and he said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H3212><s%> "Go, serve <S%H5647><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God; <S%H430><s%> but who are those who will go? <S%H1980><s%>"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "We will go <S%H3212><s%> with our young <S%H5288><s%> and with our old; <S%H2205><s%> with our sons <S%H1121><s%> and with our daughters, <S%H1323><s%> with our flocks <S%H6629><s%> and with our herds <S%H1241><s%> will we go; <S%H3212><s%> for we must hold a feast <S%H2282><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>"

He said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H3068><s%> "Yahweh be with you if I will let you go <S%H7971><s%> with your little ones! <S%H2945><s%> See, <S%H7200><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> is clearly before your faces. <S%H6440><s%>

Not so! <S%H3212><s%> Go now you who are men, <S%H1397><s%> and serve <S%H5647><s%> Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> for that is what you desire! <S%H1245><s%>" They were driven out <S%H1644><s%> from Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s presence. <S%H6440><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Stretch out <S%H5186><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%> over the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> for the locusts, <S%H697><s%> that they may come up <S%H5927><s%> on the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and eat <S%H398><s%> every herb <S%H6212><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> even all that the hail <S%H1259><s%> has left. <S%H7604><s%>"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> stretched out <S%H5186><s%> his rod <S%H4294><s%> over the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> brought <S%H5090><s%> an east <S%H6921><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%> on the land <S%H776><s%> all that day, <S%H3117><s%> and all the night; <S%H3915><s%> and when it was morning, <S%H1242><s%> the east <S%H6921><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%> brought <S%H5375><s%> the locusts. <S%H697><s%>

The locusts <S%H697><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> over all the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and rested <S%H5117><s%> in all the borders <S%H1366><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%> They were very <S%H3966><s%> grievous. <S%H3515><s%> Before <S%H6440><s%> them there were no such <S%H3651><s%> locusts <S%H697><s%> as they, <S%H310><s%> neither after them shall be such.

For they covered <S%H3680><s%> the surface <S%H5869><s%> of the whole earth, <S%H776><s%> so that the land <S%H776><s%> was darkened, <S%H2821><s%> and they ate <S%H398><s%> every herb <S%H6212><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> and all the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the trees <S%H6086><s%> which the hail <S%H1259><s%> had left. <S%H3498><s%> There remained <S%H3498><s%> nothing <S%H3418><s%> green, <S%H6086><s%> either tree or herb <S%H6212><s%> of the field, <S%H7704><s%> through all the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

Then Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> for Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> in haste, <S%H4116><s%> and he said, <S%H559><s%> "I have sinned <S%H2398><s%> against Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and against you.

Now therefore please forgive <S%H5375><s%> my sin <S%H2403><s%> again, <S%H6471><s%> and pray <S%H6279><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> that he may also take away <S%H5493><s%> from me this death. <S%H4194><s%>"
He went out <S%H3318><s%> from Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and prayed <S%H6279><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> turned <S%H2015><s%> an exceeding <S%H3966><s%> strong <S%H2389><s%> west <S%H3220><s%> wind, <S%H7307><s%> which took up <S%H5375><s%> the locusts, <S%H697><s%> and drove <S%H8628><s%> them into the Red <S%H5488><s%> Sea. <S%H3220><s%> There remained <S%H7604><s%> not one <S%H259><s%> locust <S%H697><s%> in all the borders <S%H1366><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>
But Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> hardened <S%H2388><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s heart, <S%H3820><s%> and he didn't <S%H1121><s%> let the children of Israel <S%H3478><s%> go. <S%H7971><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Stretch out <S%H5186><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%> toward the sky, <S%H8064><s%> that there may be darkness <S%H2822><s%> over the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> even darkness <S%H2822><s%> which may be felt. <S%H4959><s%>"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> stretched out <S%H5186><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> toward the sky, <S%H8064><s%> and there was a thick <S%H653><s%> darkness <S%H2822><s%> in all the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

They didn't <S%H7200><s%> see one <S%H376><s%> another, <S%H251><s%> neither did anyone <S%H376><s%> rise <S%H6965><s%> from his place for three <S%H7969><s%> days; <S%H3117><s%> but all the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> had light <S%H216><s%> in their dwellings. <S%H4186><s%>

Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Go, <S%H3212><s%> serve <S%H5647><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> Only let your flocks <S%H6629><s%> and your herds <S%H1241><s%> stay <S%H3322><s%> behind. <S%H2945><s%> Let your little ones also go with you. <S%H3212><s%>"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "You must also give <S%H5414><s%> into our hand <S%H3027><s%> sacrifices <S%H6213><s%> and burnt offerings, <S%H5930><s%> that we may sacrifice <S%H6213><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> our God. <S%H430><s%>

Our livestock <S%H4735><s%> also shall go <S%H3212><s%> with us. <S%H6541><s%> Not a hoof shall be left behind, <S%H7604><s%> for of it we must take <S%H3947><s%> to serve <S%H5647><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> our God; <S%H430><s%> and we don't <S%H3045><s%> know with what we must serve <S%H5647><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> until we come there. <S%H935><s%>"
But Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> hardened <S%H2388><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s heart, <S%H3820><s%> and he wouldn't <S%H14><s%> let them go. <S%H7971><s%>

Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H3212><s%> "Get away from me! <S%H8104><s%> Be careful to see <S%H7200><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> no more; <S%H3254><s%> for in the day <S%H3117><s%> you see <S%H7200><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> you shall die! <S%H4191><s%>"
Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "You have spoken <S%H1696><s%> well. <S%H3651><s%> I will see <S%H7200><s%> your face <S%H6440><s%> again no more. <S%H3254><s%>"
